comments.author: CRAIGALLENGARBER@VERIZON.NET
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11

I am playing  flyordie chess at http://www.flyordie.com/chess/index.html

I noticed that with Firebox new beta, I can check a players profile only once. After I check first profile then try and check any other profile, I get the first profile I looked at! Refresh doesn't make a difference. This occurs when play chess online at http://www.flyordie.com/chess/index.html and when I check a players profile. If I shut browser down and restart chess I can view one more profile but it stay with that first profile and wont show any other people info just the exact info from first profile checked. Last the feedback page freezes and I cant leave any info. 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Log on to http://www.flyordie.com/chess/index.html
2.Play chess informant!
3.Before challenging player to game attempt to check their profile.
4. First profile of player i wash to view shows up.
5. I close that profile and attempt to view any other users information chess record etc. and it shows only first profile over and over. 
Actual Results:  
The result of this issues make it impossible for me to view a players stats before we play.

Expected Results:  
I wished to view a players stats before I play them.

I tried feedback section to leave feedback and the page freezes sop I cant type in anything!
comments.creator: CRAIGALLENGARBER@VERIZON.NET
